exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R u_n_leq_n : forall n : nat, u (S n) <= u n Unable to unify "u (S ?M2369) < u ?M2369 \\/ u (S ?M2369) = u ?M2369" with "exists l : Rbar, is_lim_seq u l".

original: intros u_n_leq_n. unfold ex_lim_seq. exists (Lim_seq u). apply Lim_seq_correct. apply u_n_leq_n.
